ai-tha-ap352:1.2_0: enters the river by a river,
ai-tha-ap352:1.4_0: yellow, with yellow hue, and yellow tint.
ai-tha-ap352:2.2_0: and leaning on a pit of glowing coals.
ai-tha-ap352:2.4_0: I remember being with joined palms.
ai-tha-ap352:3.2_0: to which I raised my joined palms.
ai-tha-ap352:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap352:3.4_0: This is the fruit of repair.
ai-tha-ap352:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap352:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vidhura.
ai-tha-ap352:6.1_0: The tenth sections with one senior monks, the tenth training rules.
ai-tha-ap352:7.1_0: The fifth sub-chapter on one side is finished.
ai-tha-ap352:9.2_0: wearing a goat, lodh tree bark,
